item.title: Roblox: Heroes Online 2 Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Heroes Online 2 Codes
  • How to Redeem Heroes Online 2 Codes
  • How to Get More Heroes Online 2 Codes

Heroes Online 2 is inspired by the popular My Hero Academia anime and manga series and is a fun Roblox game. In this game, you can use different quirks to fight evil or they can choose to side with the villains. In either case, you will need a lot of Spins to get rare quirks. To speed up this process, you should use Heroes Online 2 codes.

With these codes, you can earn a lot of Spins at the very beginning of your journey. However, these codes do eventually expire. If you don't want to miss out on these free rewards, you will want to redeem these codes as soon as possible.

All Heroes Online 2 Codes

Working Heroes Online 2 Codes

  • beaver - Redeem this code to get 7 Spins
  • gigantic - Redeem this code to get 2 Rate Up Modifiers
  • teambattles - Redeem this code to get 5 Spins

Expired Heroes Online 2 Codes

  • heroHunterScar
  • newBeginnings
  • stickyGold
  • frozone

Even before you create your character in Heroes Online 2 , you can spin a quirk. It is important to note that initially, all players are quirkless. For each attempt, you will spend Spins, and if you are lucky, you can even get rare quirks. However, at first, you will only have 5 Spins, after spending which you will have to progress to earn more. But an alternative way out is to use Heroes Online 2 codes.

Each code can provide you with many valuable Spins. Moreover, some of them will reward players with various Modifiers that increase the chance of getting rare quirks. But you should hurry because after a certain time, each code expires.

How to Redeem Heroes Online 2 Codes

Using Heroes Online 2 codes is as simple as in other Roblox experiences. But even though it is easy, you will have to fulfill one requirement first. To be more precise, to claim rewards, players must join the Bloxxit Studios group. After that, you only need to make a few clicks:

  • First, launch Heroes Online 2 .
  • Then, select the Codes option in the main menu.
  • After that, enter the code and click Submit to receive your rewards.

Also, players can use codes after they spawn on the map. To do this, you will need to click on the button with three stripes in the upper chat of the screen and go to the settings tab.

How to Get More Heroes Online 2 Codes

If you want to get more Heroes Online 2 codes, you should visit the developers' social media. As with other Roblox games, you can find all the news about updates and free goodies there.

  • Bloxxit Studios Roblox Group
  • Bloxxit Studios X page
  • Heroes Online 2 Discord server

item.title: Meow Hunter Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Meow Hunter Codes
  • How to Redeem Meow Hunter Codes
  • How to Get More Meow Hunter Codes

If you love the side-scrolling RPG games and cats, then Meow Hunter is just what you need. Players will become bounty hunters and fight enemies on different planets. However, to survive, you will need to collect all available loot. And Meow Hunter codes will help you with this.

Each of these codes will reward players with various items and currencies. They are necessary for upgrading your equipment and unlocking new characters. So, if you want to progress faster, you should use all active codes.

All Meow Hunter Codes

Working Meow Hunter Codes

  • cat2024 - Redeem this code to get 50 Chips, 20 Item Fragments, and 50 Common Character Fragments
  • cat0919 - Redeem this code to get 30 Chips and 50 Common Character Fragments

Expired Meow Hunter Codes

There are no expired codes in Meow Hunter . If any of them do expire, they will be included here.

Meow Hunter offers players a roguelike experience, so each run will be different from the previous one. Defeating enemies, opening chests and clearing stages will earn you various resources and currencies. With their help, players can upgrade their abilities or equipment to become stronger. And if you want to get even more resources, you should use Meow Hunter codes.

Just one such code can give you several resources in large quantities. You can even get Character Fragments from some of them. However, the rewards are not available all the time, since after a certain time after the release, the codes expire.

How to Redeem Meow Hunter Codes

Fortunately, using codes in Meow Hunter is not more difficult than in other mobile RPGs. Players only need to make a few clicks.

  • First, launch Meow Hunter .
  • Then, follow the tutorial if you have not done so before.
  • After that, open the settings by clicking on the gear button in the upper right corner and select the Gift Code option.
  • Finally, enter the code in the box and click Confirm to get your rewards.

How to Get More Meow Hunter Codes

Compared to most other mobile games, the developers of Meow Hunter release new codes infrequently, which only increases their value. Therefore, players can visit the official developer page to avoid missing new codes in Meow Hunter . There, you will find not only codes but also news about upcoming updates and events.

  • ChillyRoom X page

Meow Hunter is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Crusaders Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Crusaders Codes
  • How to Redeem Crusaders Codes
  • How to Get More Crusaders Codes

Crusaders is one of the representatives of the dungeon crawler games. In it, players have to take out enemies in various dungeons and look for treasure. But the further you progress, the more powerful opponents you will encounter. Because of that, you will need a lot of money to upgrade your equipment. Fortunately, there is a way to get currency quickly, namely using Crusaders codes.

With these Roblox codes, you can easily earn extra money. Some of them can even reward you with up to 1000 Gems. Moreover, this feature is available to players before visiting their first dungeon.

All Crusaders Codes

Working Crusaders Codes

  • 100Likes - Redeem this code to get 1K Gems
  • BETARELEASE - Redeem this code to get 2.5K Gold

Expired Crusaders Codes

There are no expired codes in Crusaders . That said, if any do expire they will be included here.

When you first start your Crusaders adventure, you will have only a few skills and a wooden weapon. It is quite weak, but still effective for clearing the first stages of the dungeons. To find new equipment, you will have to search for treasure chests and defeat bosses. The latter is a real challenge, but the rewards are worth it. However, to upgrade the equipment or their traits, you will need Gems and Gold, which can be obtained using Crusaders codes.

Just a few of these codes will allow you to upgrade your weapon up to +6, as well as reroll traits that suit your build. However, each code has a validity period, after which it expires and the rewards become no longer available, so players should use them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Crusaders Codes

As with most other Roblox experiences, redeeming codes in Crusaders is quite simple. You just need to follow these simple steps to get all the free goodies:

  • Launch Crusaders .
  • Then, open the menu by clicking on the corresponding button in the lower right corner.
  • After that, select the Codes option.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Redeem button to use it.

How to Get More Crusaders Codes

The developers add new Roblox codes to Crusaders as players reach community milestones. In order not to miss more free goodies, make sure to visit the official developer’s page, where you will find information about upcoming updates, events, and new codes:

  • Zephsy X page
  • Crusaders Discord server
  • Crusaders // AS Roblox group

item.title: Star Wars Outlaws: Gone Solo Intel Walkthrough
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Gone Solo Intel Chain Overview
  • How to Start the Gone Solo Intel Chain
  • How to Find Clues About Moonis’s Whereabouts
  • How to Locate Moonis

One of the fun side quests in Star Wars Outlaws is Gone Solo, a lighthearted intel mission that provides a welcome break from the campaign’s often monotonous pace. Despite its comedic nature, the quest can be challenging for some Star Wars Outlaws players due to the limited clues Kay receives to track down a missing musician, Relma Moonis .

The Gone Solo mission involves deciphering a song, finding the elusive musician everyone is searching for, and convincing him to return to his role as a drummer. Here’s a guide on how to accomplish all of that.

Gone Solo Intel Chain Overview

Intel Mission

Gone Solo

Location

Tatooine

Syndicates Involved

None

Time to Complete

~ 5 to 10 Minutes

Gone Solo is an intel side quest on Tatooine that revolves around reuniting an alien music band. After speaking with a manager, you'll discover that the band’s drummer has gone solo, and his whereabouts are unknown. Your task is to find him and persuade him to rejoin the band before their show.

Gone Solo Quick Walkthrough

  1. Talk to Aldic Nelleer at Jabba’s Palace.
  2. Interrogate the bartender at the Bestine Settlement bar.
  3. Play Relma Moonis’s song on the bar’s jukebox.
  4. Head to Moonis’s hideout at Wayfar to conclude the mission.

How to Start the Gone Solo Intel Chain

To begin the Gone Solo Intel quest, speak with Aldic Nelleer . You can find her near the stage in Jabba’s Palace. Aldic will ask you to track down a musician who has chosen to leave the band and "go solo."

You must have a good reputation with the Hutt Syndicate to start this quest. The reason is that Aldic, the quest provider, resides in Jabba’s Palace, and you won’t be able to access her unless the guards let you in.

If the Gone Solo quest cannot be triggered, complete the Jabba’s Favor main quest and try again.

If you're looking to improve your reputation with the Hutts, focus on completing smuggler contracts. You can also boost your standing by selling Syndicated data to each gang's associate merchants to build trust.

How to Find Clues About Moonis’s Whereabouts

After speaking with Aldic, make your way to the bar in the Bestine Settlement . Once there, talk to the bartender and inquire about a missing musician named Remla Moonis. The bartender will ask you to play his song on the jukebox for more information.

The jukebox is located next to the bar counter. Interact with it and play the song titled " Growing Old in Wayfar ." The lyrics will provide clues to Moonis's possible location, which is in Wayfar.

Bestine Settlement is guarded by Imperial soldiers. To avoid getting caught, steer clear of its Restricted Areas.

How to Locate Moonis

To find Moonis, head to Wayfar and look for an alien sitting alone and listening to music near the Sheriff’s Office. Speak with Moonis and inform him that his band is in danger and needs him to reunite with them. After some initial reluctance, Moonis will agree to rejoin the band as their drummer, which will complete the Gone Solo Intel quest.

Wayfar is the small city on Tatooine where you first landed with the Trailblazer.

item.title: TCG Card Shop Simulator: Best Ways To Make Money
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Keep shelves stocked to prevent running out and maximize profits.
  • Sell a variety of items, especially cards, to increase income and attract customers.
  • Price items reasonably and round to whole numbers for faster transactions and customer satisfaction.

TCG Card Shop Simulator is all about making money. Earning money allows players to expand their stores, grow their stock, and hire staff. It's a fun game that gives players the power to control everything. With this power, comes risk. If the player overprices their stock or doesn't keep things flowing smoothly, they could find themselves rapidly running out of money.

Thankfully, there are plenty of things that players can do to optimize their store and keep the money coming in. From filling the shelves to selling off any unwanted cards, there are plenty of ways to earn money in TCG Card Shop Simulator.

1 Keep The Shelves Stocked

No Stock Means No Money

While obvious, it's easy to end up with bare shelves. During the early stages of the game, the player must keep everything running single-handedly, as they will have no members of staff to help them out. Between keeping the shelves filled, cleaning smelly customers, ordering stock, and manning the register, it can be all too easy to end up with empty shelves.

Always try to order extra stock . By keeping extra stock on hand, players can quickly keep things topped up and are less likely to have empty shelves. Also, it's worth taking a look at the shelves every in-game hour or so, just to make sure that nothing is running too low. Something else that's worth noting is that the top shelf can also be filled. There are lots of players out there who don't know that items can be placed on the top shelf . Utilize all possible shelving space to make more money.

2 Sell A Variety Of Items

More Variety For Customers

During the first few days, players won't have a lot of options in terms of items they can stock. But as soon as the player starts unlocking the ability to buy licenses for new products, they should invest some money in bringing some variety into their store . That said, not everything sells well. Try buying small in the early stages. Also, avoid things like figurines until the late stages of the game as they cost a lot of money, and they don't always sell particularly quickly.

Cards are the best investment. Not only can players sell packs and boxes of cards to customers, but since they can open up packs and sell individual cards, two sources of income can come from buying the licenses to sell various types of packs.

3 Price Things Reasonably

Keep An Eye On Fluctuating Prices

Prices will go up and down on an almost daily basis. With the prices constantly changing, it's easy to end up accidentally overcharging customers. Try checking the market price each day before opening the store to ensure that all of the products are being sold at a reasonable price.

If a customer thinks that the prices are too high, they are likely to comment on it. Keep an eye out for customers saying negative things about prices, as this is a clear indicator that things are priced too high. A good rule of thumb is to price things in line with the market value plus an extra 10% . However, try to round that number to a more even digit during the early stages of the game.

4 Price Things To Round Numbers When Possible

A Must During The Early Stage Of The Game

Since players will be responsible for doing all the jobs themselves during the early stages of the game, they'll need to work fast and efficiently to get everything done promptly. Working the register can be a rather time-consuming task. Since there are lots of customers to tend to, rounding prices to the nearest round number makes giving out change much easier . This applies to most of the shop simulator games.

That said, it's not always possible to round items to the nearest dollar. For the times when it's not possible to round things to the nearest whole dollar, try pricing them to the nearest 10 cents. For example, instead of charging $3.74 for something, charge $3.80 or $3.70. This will make working the register much easier.

5 Let Customers Play

Buy Plenty Of Play Tables

Play tables are a great way of making some passive income . Play tables are relatively cheap, they don't need stocking with anything, and they can be left out in the store for customers to use. Customers will come by to play. Each in-game hour that they play costs them a few dollars. The cost can be changed by the player. There are also various tournaments that the player can set up for customers to participate in.

Some of the tournaments will cost the player some money, but aside from that, these tables require no upkeep. They will just generate money while customers play. Something worth noting about these tables is that customers may end up staying past the shop's closing time. Should this happen, then it's worth waiting for the customers to finish their game , as they often end up buying a few items before leaving. That said, if just one player is sitting at a table after the store has closed, then it's just a visual bug and it won't generate any money. Just start the next day to fix it.

6 Get The Most Out Of The Workbench

Sell Any Unwanted Cards

The workbench, while relatively costly, is a worthwhile investment. As the player starts opening packs and building a collection, they will accumulate a plethora of low-value duplicates. Instead of taking up valuable space inside a card table, players can use a workbench to bundle up their low-value cards and then sell them in-store . This is a great way of turning a profit from bad packs.

If priced reasonably, card bundles tend to sell very well. Since most players will open up multiple packs each day, they will always have plenty of cards that they can throw into a bundle to sell.
